subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After a few unsettled seasons, Giants defensive end Osi Umenyiora, who agreed in June to a restructured one-year, $6 million contract, says he is happy with the Giants.
snippet: After a few unsettled seasons, Giants defensive end Osi Umenyiora, who agreed in June to a restructured one-year, $6 million contract, says he is happy with the Giants.
